message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth discussing. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $16250.
